Paloma

cocktail
tequila

Ingredients

  • 2 oz blanco tequila
  • 2 oz grape fruit juice
  • 3/4 oz lime juice
  • 3/4 oz agave nectar or simple syrup
  • 2 oz club soda

Procedure

  1. Pour ingredients (except club soda) into a shaker with ice
  2. Shake until chilled
  3. Strain into highball glass with fresh ice
  4. Top with club soda and stir gently to combine
  5. Optionally garnish with grapefruit wedge
